explains: n. 装饰，装饰品；勋章，奖章；装潢，装饰风格
wordGroup: interior decoration 室内装饰；内部装饰

sentences.en: He gave Stephanie a free hand in the decoration.
sentences.cn: 他让斯蒂芬妮在装潢时便宜行事。

sentences.en: It was a building without any adornment or decoration.
sentences.cn: 它曾是一栋完全未经装修的大楼。

sentences.en: The room was austere, nearly barren of furniture or decoration.
sentences.cn: 这个房间很简朴，几乎没有什么家具或装饰。
